page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT BILLINGSHURST
page.content: EMPLOYMENT IN THE VILLAGE AREA IS PROVIDED BY A SUPERMARKET,A DRY CLEANERS,A NEWSAGENT,2 HAIRDRESSERS, A TRAVEL AGENT,A CHINA/GLASSWARE SHOP,2 GREENGROCERS,2 WINE SHOPS,ONE WITH A DELICATESSEN,A BAKER A BUTCHER,A LAUNDERETTE,A LIBRARY,A FISH AND CHIP SHOP,2 BANKS,A CHEMIST,A PUBLIC HOUSE, A BOOKSHOP,A SPORTS SHOP,A POST OFFICE A SOLIICITORS,A CYCLE/MOTOR ACCESSORY SHOP,ART SHOP,IRONMONGERS,2 GARAGES, BABY SHOP,DRUG MART,FREEZER SHOP, CHINESE AND INDIAN RESTAURANTS,A BUILDING SOCIETY,A PHOTOGRAPHIC/RECORD SHOP,2 LADIES FASHIONS SHOPS,A WOOL AND FABRIC SHOP,AN INSURANCE BROKERS, AND A NUMBER OF OTHER OFFICES.
